Title: Object: No More Killing
Description: Painting, oil on canvas; figures and writing in Arabic and English on a colourful background; signed and dated.
School/style: Middle East & North Africa Modern Art
Bibliographic references: Porter 2006 / Word into Art: Artists of the Middle East (88)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2008 7 Feb-30 Apr, Dubai International Finance Centre, Word into Art, cat.97 2006 18 May-2 Sept, London, BM, Word into Art, cat.88
Funder name: Funded by: Brooke Sewell Permanent Fund
